results.idea: Estimated vs Actual EPS surprise (raw)
results.description: Core: Long stocks where estimated EPS > last actual EPS. I applied SUGGESTION1 by combining two fields (ern6_estimated_eps, ern6_actual_eps). SUGGESTION2: not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4: used high userCount field ern6_estimated_eps. Kept KEEP_IN_MINDs: implementation short, uses 2 datafields and few operators. Confidence: 0.75.

results.idea: Estimate revision momentum (delta over 30d)
results.description: Core: Identify stocks with rising analyst estimates via ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,30). SUGGESTION1: single high-quality field used (ern6_estimated_eps). SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: coverage fine. SUGGESTION4: chosen because high userCount. Respects KEEP_IN_MIND limits. Confidence: 0.78.

results.idea: Estimate surprise scaled by recent volatility
results.description: Core: Surprise divided by recent std of estimates to prefer consistent signals. Used ern6_estimated_eps and ern6_actual_eps (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: both fields have good user/alpha counts. Kept operators <=7 and fields <=2. Confidence: 0.72.

results.idea: Preliminary EPS range width (uncertainty)
results.description: Core: Wider preliminary range (upper-lower) signals higher uncertainty and reversion opportunity. Applied SUGGESTION1 combining preliminary_eps_range_upper_bound and preliminary_eps_range_lower_bound. SUGGESTION2/3 not relevant. Fields moderate userCount; acceptable. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence: 0.45.

results.idea: Estimate revision zscore (cross-sectional)
results.description: Core: Cross-sectional zscore of latest estimate minus 60d mean to capture extremes. Used SUGGESTION1 with ern6_estimated_eps only. SUGGESTION2/3 not applicable. SUGGESTION4: high userCount. Kept implementation concise. Confidence: 0.76.

results.idea: EPS change percentage momentum
results.description: Core: Use recent eps_change_percentage_value ts_delta to find accelerating EPS growth. SUGGESTION1: single datafield used. SUGGESTION3: coverage >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: userCount low but acceptable. Kept operators simple. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Long after ‘Before Market’ scheduled announcements
results.description: Core: Stocks with ern6_estimated_tod == 'Before Market' historically show overnight reaction patterns. SUGGESTION1: used ern6_estimated_tod (categorical). SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION4: field has full coverage. Kept operators minimal (if_else + quantile). Confidence: 0.4.

results.idea: After-market surprise follow-through
results.description: Core: If announcement time is 'After Market' expect next-day momentum; use ern6_time_of_day flag. SUGGESTION1: one categorical used. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: good coverage. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence: 0.42.

results.idea: Conference call presence boost
results.description: Core: Stocks with a conference call (ern6_goto_broadcast non-null) often have greater information flow. SUGGESTION1: single field ern6_goto_broadcast. SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: coverage good. SUGGESTION4: high userCount. Confidence: 0.35.

results.idea: Estimate momentum + low preliminary range
results.description: Core: Positive estimate revisions combined with tight preliminary range (confidence in estimate). SUGGESTION1: combines ern6_estimated_eps and preliminary range fields. SUGGESTION3: range coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION4: chosen high-quality estimate field. Respects KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: Estimate to previous quarter gap
results.description: Core: Compare ern6_estimated_eps to ern6_actual_eps lagged one quarter to spot upgrades. Applied SUGGESTION1 with ts_delay. SUGGESTION3 not required. SUGGESTION4 used high-count fields. KEEP_IN_MIND followed. Confidence: 0.74.

results.idea: Pre-earnings dividend change signal
results.description: Core: Dividend status changes (ern6_dividend_status) may signal fundamentals change. SUGGESTION1 used single dividend field. SUGGESTION2/3 not applicable. Field has full coverage per DATA. Confidence: 0.33.

results.idea: High EPS revision with upcoming earnings date proximity
results.description: Core: Positive ts_delta on estimates and upcoming next ED present (ern6_next_ed not-null). SUGGESTION1 combined ern6_estimated_eps and ern6_next_ed. SUGGESTION3: next_ed coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION4 used estimate field. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.7.

results.idea: Post-earnings drift using actual EPS surprise
results.description: Core: Absolute surprise (abs(actual - estimate)) signals post-earnings drift. Used ern6_actual_eps and ern6_estimated_eps per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence moderate. Kept implementation short. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Estimate revision divided by company dividend yield proxy
results.description: Core: Prefer revisions in low dividend stocks (proxy via ern6_div_freq as categorical). SUGGESTION1 uses two fields ern6_estimated_eps and ern6_div_freq. SUGGESTION3: div_freq coverage =1. I convert category to numeric via if_else. KEEP_IN_MINDs met. Confidence: 0.38.

results.idea: Estimate dispersion normalized by historical std
results.description: Core: (estimate - mean)/std to capture extreme upgrades. Single field ern6_estimated_eps used (SUGGESTION1 minimal). SUGGESTION3 not required. Confidence: 0.77.

results.idea: Surprise sign for directional trade
results.description: Core: Use sign(actual - estimate) to create long/short signal. SUGGESTION1 combined ern6_actual_eps and ern6_estimated_eps. Kept simple. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Rapid estimate increase (short window)
results.description: Core: ts_delta over 7 days on estimates to catch fast momentum. SUGGESTION1: single field. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence lower due to noise. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Estimate momentum with winsorization
results.description: Core: Reduce outliers by winsorizing estimate delta before ranking. SUGGESTION1 used ern6_estimated_eps. SUGGESTION4: high userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND obeyed. Confidence: 0.73.

results.idea: Estimate revision IR over 60d
results.description: Core: Use ts_ir(ts_delta) to favor stable improvements: ts_ir(ern6_estimated_eps,60). SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.7.

results.idea: Large preliminary upper bound upgrades
results.description: Core: Big increases in preliminary upper bound indicate positive guidance. Use ts_delta(preliminary_eps_range_upper_bound,30). SUGGESTION1 single field. Coverage adequate. Confidence: 0.48.

results.idea: Small preliminary lower bound decline as signal
results.description: Core: Narrowing lower bound (decline) may indicate management conservatism leading to surprises. Used preliminary lower bound only. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.4.

results.idea: Conference-call timing early vs late
results.description: Core: Use conferencecalltime presence/time to proxy transparency (ern6_conferencecalltime). SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.3.

results.idea: Estimate vs estimated_fiscal_year gap
results.description: Core: Compare estimated fiscal year changes with estimates for seasonality; uses ern6_estimated_fiscal_year and ern6_estimated_eps. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.44.

results.idea: Estimate rank over peers (cross-sectional)
results.description: Core: Quantile rank of ern6_estimated_eps across universe to pick relative winners. SUGGESTION1 used single field. SUGGESTION4: high userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: High estimate with no conference call
results.description: Core: Stocks with strong estimate levels but no conference call (possible undercoverage) might mean mispricing. Combined ern6_estimated_eps and ern6_goto_broadcast (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.36.

results.idea: Estimate acceleration vs 90d mean
results.description: Core: ts_av_diff(ern6_estimated_eps,90) to detect acceleration above mean. SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION4: high-quality. Confidence: 0.71.

results.idea: Long low-split-risk high-upgrade
results.description: Core: Favor upgrades in stocks without imminent splits (ern6_split_status). Combined ern6_estimated_eps and ern6_split_status (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.34.

results.idea: Estimate improvement normalized by historical absolute change
results.description: Core: divide ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,30) by ts_mean(abs(ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,30)),252). SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION3 not required. Confidence: 0.69.

results.idea: Actual EPS trending vs estimate trend divergence
results.description: Core: ts_delta(ern6_actual_eps,90) - ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,90) to find divergence. SUGGESTION1 uses both fields. SUGGESTION3: actual_eps coverage good. Confidence: 0.67.

results.idea: Preliminary link presence as signal (management transparency)
results.description: Core: Stocks with a preliminary earnings link (ern6_prelim_earnings_link) indicate early disclosures. SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.28.

results.idea: Estimate reversal after extreme zscore
results.description: Core: Reverse trade when ts_zscore(ern6_estimated_eps,120) is extreme. SUGGESTION1 one field. SUGGESTION3 not applicable. Confidence moderate. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: High estimated_eps with low preliminary range (quality)
results.description: Core: High estimates but narrow preliminary range signals confident growth. Uses ern6_estimated_eps and preliminary range fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Estimated EPS seasonal rank (quarterly)
results.description: Core: Rank estimates within same estimated_period (quarter) using ern6_estimated_period as group indicator converted into numeric bucket; limited grouping via bucket not using GROUP operator. SUGGESTION1: two fields ern6_estimated_eps and ern6_estimated_period. KEEP_IN_MIND: avoided GROUP operators. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Large EPS surprise with broadcast present
results.description: Core: Large abs(actual-estimate) and broadcast present to capture high-information events. SUGGESTION1 combined two fields. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Estimate trend persistence (ts_product proxy)
results.description: Core: Use ts_product( sign(ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,d)) ) over short d to detect consistent upgrades; implemented via ts_product of deltas. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence lower due to binary approach. Confidence: 0.46.

results.idea: Estimate change per share split-adjusted
results.description: Core: Normalize estimate changes by split ratio (ern6_stock_split_ratio) to avoid distortions. SUGGESTION1 uses two fields. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.39.

results.idea: Fast upgrade then quiet (estimate jump without call)
results.description: Core: Big ts_delta in estimates but no goto_broadcast suggests private upgrade likely to persist. SUGGESTION1 uses ern6_estimated_eps and ern6_goto_broadcast. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Estimate zscore cross-sectionally per sector proxy (exchange)
results.description: Core: Normalize estimates per exchange (ern6_eps6ww_status) as a crude sector proxy. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied; SUGGESTION4 used high coverage fields. Kept within operator limits. Confidence: 0.47.

results.idea: Pre-announcement estimate drift (14d mean)
results.description: Core: ts_mean(ern6_estimated_eps,14) deviation to detect drifting estimates before announcement. Single field used per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Estimate revision frequency (count of non-nulls)
results.description: Core: Use ts_count_nans inverted on estimates to proxy number of updates; more updates = more attention. SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION3 not required. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Estimate surprise scaled by EPS change percent
results.description: Core: Multiply surprise by eps_change_percentage_value to favor momentum in EPS itself. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Low preliminary range rank among upgrades
results.description: Core: Take upgrades (ts_delta est >0) and rank by small preliminary range. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION3: not required. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Estimate acceleration relative to fiscal year peers
results.description: Core: Compare ts_delta of estimates normalized by estimated_fiscal_year buckets (coarse). Used ern6_estimated_eps and ern6_estimated_fiscal_year. SUGGESTION1 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND: avoided GROUP ops. Confidence: 0.45.

results.idea: High information events: large surprise & conference call time during market
results.description: Core: Abs surprise and conference call during market amplify signal. Uses ern6_actual_eps, ern6_estimated_eps, ern6_time_of_day (two fields max by encoding). SUGGESTION1 used two numeric/categorical fields. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Estimate change vs 1-year median
results.description: Core: Subtract median (approx via ts_quantile with driver=uniform) to find relative upgrades. SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: Persistent underestimation: estimate below actual historically
results.description: Core: Stocks whose estimates historically lag actuals (mean(actual - estimate)>0) may have predictable corrections. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Estimate shock detection via ts_arg_max
results.description: Core: ts_arg_max(ern6_estimated_eps,30) = 0 indicates current max; treat as breakout. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Estimate jump with no transcript (low disclosure)
results.description: Core: Large ts_delta in estimate but no transcript_quarter (ern6_transcript_quarter null) suggests uncommunicated upgrades. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence: 0.41.

results.idea: Estimate growth vs last fiscal year actual
results.description: Core: Compare current estimate to last fiscal year actual (ern6_actual_fiscal_year) with ern6_estimated_eps. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Pre-announcement volatility suppressed estimate signal
results.description: Core: Low ts_std_dev(ern6_estimated_eps,60) with positive delta indicates confident upgrade. Uses single field. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.64.

results.idea: Estimate change normalized by count of updates
results.description: Core: Divide ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,30) by (vec of update counts approximated by reverse ts_count_nans). SUGGESTION1 single field used. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence: 0.49.

results.idea: Estimate surprise with recent ts_returns proxy
results.description: Core: Multiply surprise by recent returns proxy (use ts_returns on wq receive timestamp as proxy cadence). SUGGESTION1 uses ern6_actual_eps and ern6_estimated_eps; ts_returns applied to ern6_wqreceivetimestamp as cadence indicator. SUGGESTION3: timestamp coverage high. Confidence: 0.37.

results.idea: Estimate consistency via ts_kurtosis
results.description: Core: Low kurtosis of estimate history indicates stable revisions; favor positive deltas in low kurtosis stocks. SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: Estimate improvement after meeting held
results.description: Core: If meeting_status='HELD' (ern6_meeting_status) and estimate increases recently, signal stronger. SUGGESTION1 uses two fields. SUGGESTION3 not required. Confidence: 0.43.

results.idea: Surprise magnitude weighted by dividend amount
results.description: Core: Larger surprises in dividend-paying stocks may matter more. Uses ern6_x_dividend and surprise. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 not required. Confidence: 0.34.

results.idea: Estimate momentum filtered by estimated_etype verified
results.description: Core: Only use estimates with ern6_estimated_etype='Verified' to increase signal quality. Used ern6_estimated_eps and ern6_estimated_etype. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION4: verified field has coverage 1. Confidence: 0.7.

results.idea: Estimate upgrade frequency signal (days since last change)
results.description: Core: days_from_last_change(ern6_estimated_eps) small indicates active revisions; combine with positive delta. SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Estimate surprise scaled by ts_max_diff
results.description: Core: Use ts_max_diff(ern6_estimated_eps,252) to scale surprise relative to yearly highs. Single field used per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Rank upgrades excluding companies with pending splits
results.description: Core: Favor upgrades but exclude pending splits (ern6_split_status). Used two fields. Kept ops minimal. Confidence: 0.48.

results.idea: Estimate surprise flagged by preliminary link but no broadcast
results.description: Core: Preliminary link exists but no broadcast — possible quietly distributed guidance. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.4.

results.idea: Estimate change relative to typical weekday cadence
results.description: Core: Use ts_step or wq timestamp to detect weekday-driven updates — here using ern6_wqreceivetimestamp as cadence. Two fields used (estimate + timestamp). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.35.

results.idea: Estimate jump followed by arg_min earlier (freshness)
results.description: Core: ts_arg_min indicates current is lowest over lookback; if followed by large positive delta, expect mean-reversion. Single field used. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Absolute EPS change momentum
results.description: Core: Use eps_change_absolute_value recent increases as straightforward momentum. SUGGESTION1 single field. Coverage high. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Estimate vs estimate one quarter ago
results.description: Core: subtract current estimate and ts_delay(ern6_estimated_eps,63) to detect quarter-over-quarter upgrades. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: Estimate zscore and winsorize for stability
results.description: Core: zscore then winsorize to reduce tail risk. Single field. Applied SUGGESTION4 by choosing high alphaCount field. Confidence: 0.72.

results.idea: Estimate jump with high estimated_tod clarity
results.description: Core: If estimated_tod specified (Before/During/After), combine clarity with delta. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.46.

results.idea: Conservative estimate beat (actual > upper preliminary bound)
results.description: Core: actual_eps > preliminary_upper bound indicates clear beat. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: Estimate surprise per announcement time bucket
results.description: Core: Scale surprise by time_of_day buckets (Before/During/After). Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.44.

results.idea: Estimate change sign persistence (7d)
results.description: Core: sign(ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,7)) aggregated via ts_sum to detect persistent direction. Single field used. SUGGESTION2 not used. Confidence: 0.51.

results.idea: Estimate momentum adjusted for meeting status
results.description: Core: Enhance signal if meeting_status='INPROCESS' or 'HELD'. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.42.

results.idea: Estimate cumulative revisions (ts_sum over 90d)
results.description: Core: ts_sum(ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,d),90) to capture accumulated upgrades. Single field used. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.7.

results.idea: Estimate vs market hours proxy (time_zone)
results.description: Core: Use ern6_time_zone to adjust for reporting schedules coupled with surprise. Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.33.

results.idea: Estimate downgrade early warning
results.description: Core: large negative ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,30) indicates downgrade; short signal. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Surprise weighted by transcript quarter presence
results.description: Core: Large surprise with recent transcript quarter noted (ern6_transcript_quarter) may amplify informational content. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.49.

results.idea: Estimate change ranked across universe (quantile)
results.description: Core: Simple cross-sectional quantile of ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,30). SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION4 used field with many alphas. Confidence: 0.69.

results.idea: Estimate change vs preliminary upper relative gap
results.description: Core: (estimated - preliminary_upper) negative indicates conservative estimates; prefer positives. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.46.

results.idea: Frequent estimate updates with positive returns proxy
results.description: Core: high update frequency (low ts_count_nans) and positive estimate delta. Single field used. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Estimate jump on verified estimated_etype only
results.description: Core: Focus on upgrades where estimated_etype='Verified'. Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.71.

results.idea: Estimate growth fragility via ts_std_dev/growth
results.description: Core: Divide ts_std_dev(ern6_estimated_eps,60) by ts_delta to avoid volatile false signals. Single field used. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Large preliminary lower bound increase
results.description: Core: ts_delta(preliminary_eps_range_lower_bound,30) up indicates management raising floor — bullish. Single field used. Confidence: 0.43.

results.idea: Estimate improvement concentrated near next ED
results.description: Core: Multiply delta by indicator of upcoming next_ed non-null to capture pre-earnings revisions. Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.67.

results.idea: Estimate surprise by ticker country flag (eps6stock_symbol prefix)
results.description: Core: Adjust for CA. prefix in symbol (ern6_eps6stock_symbol) — here a proxy used via if_else. Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.3.

results.idea: Estimate zscore over 30d then quantile
results.description: Core: ts_zscore(ern6_estimated_eps,30) cross-sectional quantile to capture short-term extremes. Single field used. Confidence: 0.7.

results.idea: Estimate upgrade with no press release source
results.description: Core: If ern6_actual_source != 'PR' but large surprise, possibility of private channels sustaining mispricing. Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.36.

results.idea: Estimate jump concentration by stock exchange
results.description: Core: Scale delta by exchange (ern6_stock_exchange) via simple encoding to prefer certain exchanges. Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.32.

results.idea: Estimate persistence measured by ts_arg_max across 90d
results.description: Core: if ts_arg_max==0 and delta positive => breakout persistence. Single field used. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Large surprise with long dividend frequency
results.description: Core: Surprises in annually-dividing stocks may be more informative; combine surprise with ern6_div_freq. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.34.

results.idea: Estimate directional bet using sign of ts_av_diff
results.description: Core: sign(ts_av_diff(ern6_estimated_eps,60)) to get direction normalized to mean. Single field used. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: Estimate surprise magnitude adjusted by preliminary link presence
results.description: Core: multiply surprise by preliminary link indicator to prioritize transparent pre-announcements. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.38.

results.idea: Estimate improvement concentrated after confirmed estimate type
results.description: Core: Favor ts_delta when ern6_etype=='V' (Verified). Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Surprise scaled by transcript_quarter numeric presence
results.description: Core: amplify surprise when transcript quarter exists. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.47.

results.idea: Estimate jump vs 252d mean absolute diff
results.description: Core: subtract ts_mean absolute over year to detect outlier upgrades. Single field used. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Estimate change normalized by vec_count proxy (use vec_count on company names not numeric — skip)
results.description: Core: Intended to use vector field but datafields are non-vector; per SUGGESTION2 not applied. Kept to single-field ts_delta approach instead. Confidence: 0.2.

results.idea: Estimate surprise with morning/after-market binary weight
results.description: Core: weigh surprise by ern6_time_of_day buckets. Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.4.

results.idea: Estimate acceleration vs 14d rolling mean
results.description: Core: ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,7) - ts_mean(ts_delta(ern6_estimated_eps,1),14) to detect sudden acceleration. Single field used. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Conservative management surprises: actual < preliminary lower
results.description: Core: actual below preliminary lower bound signals negative surprise; short. Uses two fields. Confidence: 0.6.

results.idea: Estimate jump filtered by estimated_period known
results.description: Core: require ern6_estimated_period non-null when evaluating ts_delta to ensure relevant quarter. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.5.

results.idea: Estimate growth per announced conference call timeslot
results.description: Core: weight ts_delta by presence of conference call time (ern6_conferencecalltime). Two fields used. Confidence: 0.35.

results.idea: Estimate stability: low ts_std_dev and positive surprise
results.description: Core: favor surprise when ts_std_dev(ern6_estimated_eps,90) low. Single field used. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Estimate upgrade accompanied by broadcast (high visibility)
results.description: Core: ts_delta positive and goto_broadcast present — stronger reaction expected. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Estimate percentile rank compared to historical 1-year range
results.description: Core: ts_scale(ern6_estimated_eps,252) to get percentile in time and rank cross-sectionally. Single field used. Confidence: 0.67.

results.idea: Estimate gap relative to estimated_next_quarter
results.description: Core: Compare current estimate to ern6_next_ed_quarter proxy by encoding; two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied; kept simple. Confidence: 0.3.

results.idea: Estimate jump preceded by many NaNs (sudden information)
results.description: Core: large delta after many NaNs (reverse ts_count_nans high) suggests surprise. Single field used. Confidence: 0.45.

results.idea: Estimate-based IR (ts_ir) to prefer stable improvements
results.description: Core: Use ts_ir(ern6_estimated_eps,120) directly as signal. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence: 0.7.

results.idea: Estimate trend vs preliminary upper/lower midpoint
results.description: Core: compare estimated_eps to midpoint of preliminary bounds; two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.48.

results.idea: Estimate improvement with low ts_kurtosis (stable history)
results.description: Core: prefer positive ts_delta when ts_kurtosis low. Single field used. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Estimate surprise sign filtered by estimated_etype 'Verified'
results.description: Core: sign(actual-estimate) only when estimated_etype='Verified'. Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: Estimate jump that is also current period max (ts_arg_max)
results.description: Core: ts_arg_max(ern6_estimated_eps,60)==0 and large positive delta indicates strong revision. Single field used. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Estimate surprise inverse volatility weighting
results.description: Core: surprise divided by ts_std_dev(actual_eps,60) to weight by realized volatility. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Estimate upgrades concentrated in verified etype and with broadcast
results.description: Core: ts_delta positive, estimated_etype='Verified' and goto_broadcast present -> high conviction. Uses three predicates but only two datafields combined at a time (implemented sequentially). SUGGESTION1 applied; KEEP_IN_MIND respected (operators limited). Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: Large surprise with low preliminary range rank
results.description: Core: abs(actual-estimate) divided by preliminary range to prioritize clear surprises relative to guidance width. Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Estimate direction consensus (sign of avg recent deltas)
results.description: Core: average sign of ts_delta over 30d to detect consensus upgrading. Single field used. SUGGESTION2 not applied. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Estimate surprise filtered by stock exchange NA/WW
results.description: Core: Scale surprise by ern6_eps6ww_status (NA vs WW). Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.31.

results.idea: Estimate improvement concentrated in certain fiscal year buckets
results.description: Core: Multiply delta by indicator of estimated_fiscal_year matching recent trend (simple encoding). Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.27.

results.idea: Pre-earnings estimate compression (narrowing range) signal
results.description: Core: decrease in preliminary range (upper-lower) via ts_delta negative indicates narrowing uncertainty — combine with positive delta. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Estimate surprise amplified by conferencecalltime presence
results.description: Core: abs surprise * indicator(conferencecalltime present). Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.46.

results.idea: Estimate zscore across a short window then reverse (mean-revert)
results.description: Core: ts_zscore(ern6_estimated_eps,14) reversed to capture mean reversion of short-term extreme estimate moves. Single field used. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Estimate improvement with low historical ts_count_nans
results.description: Core: upgrades in stocks with historically frequent updates (low ts_count_nans) may be more reliable. Single field used. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.48.

results.idea: Estimate surprise normalized by past-year median absolute deviation
results.description: Core: divide abs(actual-estimate) by ts_std_dev(actual,252) to scale by realized dispersion. Two fields used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.6.
